attributes.action: observe the rule of law by reinstating the BAE- Saudi Arabia criminal investigation by the SFO.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "observe the rule of law by reinstating the BAE- Saudi Arabia criminal investigation by the SFO."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11544.asp

Prime Minister's Office
